description: Try our easy to follow Bacon & Brussels Sprouts Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Bacon & Brussels Sprouts Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a barbecue grill to medium. Trim stem ends of the sprouts and blanch in a saucepan of boiling water for 8 minutes or until just tender. Drain and toss with oil and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Cool slightly.
Skewer the sprouts, rolled bacon pieces and capsicum alternately onto metal skewers. Cook skewers, turning often, for about 5-8 minutes or until slightly charred and tender.
